mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.dealcodenum AS "dealcodenum", a.dealcodeamount AS "dealcodeamount", a.datetime AS "datetime", a.cycle AS "cycle", a.peopleId AS "peopleId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demotable( name, dealcodenum, dealcodeamount, datetime ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{dealcodenum}, #{dealcodeamount}, #{datetime} )

INSERT INTO demotable( name, dealcodenum, dealcodeamount, datetime, peopleId ) VALUES
( #{item.name}, #{item.dealcodenum}, #{item.dealcodeamount}, #{item.datetime}, #{item.peopleId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.Id as peopleId, a.name as name, SUM(IFNULL(d.dealcodeNum,0)) as dealcodenum, SUM(IFNULL(d.dealcodeAmount,0)) as dealcodeamount, d.datetime as datetime, 'Q0' as cycle, FROM t_mis_dunning_people a LEFT JOIN demotable d on d.peopleId = a.Id WHERE a.DunningCycle LIKE concat('%','Q0','%') and a.Invalid = 't' and a.auto = 't' GROUP BY a.Id ORDER BY dealcodeAmount,a.Id
